Name: Userology AI
Tagline: The AI user research agent for busy product teams
Topics: User Experience, Artificial Intelligence, UX Design
Description: Userology is your AI user researcher on autopilot. Drop in a Figma prototype or live product, set your target persona, and our AI recruits users, moderates sessions, and turns messy transcripts into bite-sized insight reports with clips, quotes, and clear next steps.

Name: Loki.Build
Tagline: Design and ship studio-grade landing pages with AI
Description: Loki.Build is an AI-native website builder that generates studio-grade landing pages and gives you full control in a real, live editor. Built-in SEO, hosting & complete control. No more agencies. No more rigid templates. No more waiting to ship.

Name: KnockKnock!
Tagline: Minimal circular video calls that start with a "door" knock
Description: KnockKnock! is built for small, trusted circles: teammates, friends, and family. No meeting links, no waiting rooms ‚Äî just quick, direct calls that don't take up your whole screen. Mac-native one-click video calling with LiveKit low-latency streaming, secure Firebase sign-in, and customizable colours and themes. Floating call windows and 5-minute limits make every interaction spontaneous, focused, and fun ‚Äî perfect for quick, meaningful connections anytime.

Name: VoiceNotes
Tagline: One tap record with live transcription + automatic cleanup
Description: Most voice tools stop at recording or raw transcripts. VoiceNotes.me is built for frictionless capture ‚Üí usable notes. One tap to record, live transcription as you speak, and automatic cleanup into clean, editable notes. No files, no setup, no reformatting. Just think out loud and keep moving.

Name: Evidence
Tagline: A modern dev workflow for your most important data products
Description: Data teams already treat queries, models, and transformations as code. Yet embedded analytics is often built in drag-and-drop BI tools, without version control or reliable deployment workflows. That‚Äôs a poor fit for one of your most critical, customer-visible data products. Embedded analytics in Evidence introduces a code-first way to build customer reporting that fits seamlessly in your app - and can be owned entirely by the data team.

Name: LocaleX
Tagline: Localize your apps with AI-powered auto translation
Description: Localization shouldn't be a headache. ü§Ø As developers, we hate managing spreadsheets manually. That's why we built LocaleX. Name: SAM Audio
Tagline: Segment any sound with text, visual, or time prompts
Description: SAM Audio is a unified model that separates any sound from any source. Use text ("dog barking"), visual clicks on video, or time spans to isolate specific audio. It unifies speech, music, and sound effect separation into one promptable model.

Name: GitStory
Tagline: Turn your GitHub commits into a cinematic story
Topics: Design Tools, Open Source, Developer Tools, GitHub
Description: Every commit tells a story. GitStory turns your GitHub activity into a cinematic, shareable timeline ‚Äî perfect for developers who want to visualize their journey beyond graphs.

Name: Vurge
Tagline: It's like Clay but in Google Sheets
Description: Supercharge your spreadsheet with an AI-powered web scraper. Extract any data from any website into your Google Sheets in seconds.

Name: Quickleap
Tagline: Domain redirecting service without hassle.
Description: Professional domain redirect and URL forwarding service with automatic HTTPS/SSL, 301/302 redirects, path forwarding, and API support. Redirect unlimited domains without hosting hassles. Free trial available.

Name: ZoneShare
Tagline: Perfect screen sharing for ultrawide monitors | macos app
Description: Struggling to share your ultra-wide screen in video calls? You do not want to share sensitive data to your audience? Share Zone lets you mirror a portion of the screen while blurring selected apps or even browser tabs to keep your privacy safe. ‚úÖ Custom screen area selection with adjustable size & position ‚úÖ Predefined aspect ratios like 16:9, 4:3, 21:9 etc. ‚úÖ Toolbar to annotate directly on the shared content ‚úÖ Blur select apps, browser tabs or the whole content ‚úÖ Global hotkeys ‚úÖ And more

Name: EduRev (Education Revolution)
Tagline: Netflix for Education
Description: EduRev (Education Revolution) is an Indian Edtech Startup, offering courses for both school education and major Indian competitive examinations such as JEE, NEET, GATE, CAT, and UPSC. It has 25Mn+ registered users, 5 Mn+ Android App downloads (4.6 rating), awarded as Best App by Google, funded by Y Combinator (W20 Batch), Edtech Startup of the Year award by the Entrepreneur India, Startup of the Year by TieCON. Featured in Techcrunch, Yourstory, CNBC, Times of India, The Quint & others.

Name: Notch Cinematic Shorts
Tagline: Create viral video ads that perform while being on-brand.
Description: Cinematic Shorts turns your product link into fast, on-brand, high-performing video ads that you can customize as you go, at a fraction of the usual cost and time.

Name: Knowledge Painter
Tagline: Visualize the knowledge in your textbooks
Description: Have you imagined making the knowledge in textbooks come alive? With just one sentence, Knowledge Painter can generate personalized knowledge videos, animations, or web applications tailored to you, and you can engage with them directly.

Name: isla
Tagline: Build a powerful personal brand in just 20 minutes a day
Description: isla helps you build a reputation that attracts customers, investors, and talent. By analyzing trends and aligning them with your brand and your daily work, it gives you daily content direction and fast writing support so your personal brand grows effortlessly.

Name: Press Subject Line Generator
Tagline: Write newsroom-style subject lines journalists open
Description: Writing subject lines for journalist outreach is harder than it looks. Most PR tools give generic or overly salesy templates. This free Press Subject Line Generator helps founders and marketers write newsroom-style subject lines that feel more natural and closer to how journalists actually write. You enter your angle and get a few subject line ideas you can use right away. No signup required. Just a simple tool for better media outreach.

Name: MyYear.Review
Tagline: Create a shareable recap of the year for your family & team.
Description: Create a shareable recap of your year for you, your family, or your team in minutes, for free. Features: ‚Ä¢ üé® Customizable Design: Choose themes or build your own.‚Ä© ‚Ä¢ üì∏ Rich Media: Add photos, memories, and highlights.‚Ä© ‚Ä¢ üîí Easy Private Sharing: Share your story with a simple link.‚Ä© ‚Ä¢ üí∏ 100% Free: No app required, works in your browser. Perfect for founders, families, and anyone who wants to tell their 2025 story in style.

Name: MCP Bundles
Tagline: Your tools, bundled for AI
Description: Cloud-hosted MCP bundles that solve the "many tool" problem. Mission control for MCP connections: centralized OAuth/API keys, clear permissions, and full observability with tool-call history (inputs, outputs, errors). Build workflow-focused bundles across providers, or use the Hub to search and run the right tool automatically. One-click install for Cursor and mcpb for Claude Desktop.

Name: Calm Noise
Tagline: Gentle background noise for sleep, focus, and calm
Description: Calm Noise is a lightweight, browser-based noise tool designed for sleep, focus, and masking speech. It offers two interface styles ‚Äî a Clean UI for minimal distraction, and a Control UI for users who prefer tactile, expressive controls. No accounts, no ads, no tracking-heavy clutter. Just calm, steady sound you can run instantly in your browser.

Name: ShipBoard
Tagline: Stop Alt-Tabbing. Ship Feedback Directly From VS Code.
Description: Don't let user feedback die in Slack threads or email chains. ShipBoard pipes prioritized feedback directly into your IDE, so you can fix, build, and ship without ever leaving your flow state.
